title: 782. Coaching Hires, Rookie QB Report Final Grades & AFC North Body Shop
itunes:title: 782. Coaching Hires, Rookie QB Report Final Grades & AFC North Body Shop
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis are back with a special new episode of Move the Sticks. The guys start by breaking down 3 recent news topics. Next, the trio put the Bengals and Browns in the body shop to look at their team needs and break down what they can do to improve this offseason. Following that, the guys look at all the recent coaching hires across the league. Then, the trio give final grades to the rookie quarterbacks based off their performances this season. Next, the guys put the Steelers and Ravens into the body shop. To wrap up the show, the trio give players to watch out for from the 2022 HBCU Legacy Bowl.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
